entities.description: B组收费refers to a billing category applicable to customers using medium or low voltage power supply, with specific power and consumption criteria.<SEP>B组收费refers to a specific category of electricity tariffs that are adjusted quarterly based on production costs.<SEP>B组收费refers to a specific tariff category applicable to customers using medium or low voltage power supply, with defined conditions for power consumption and charges.

收费调整系数 is a coefficient used to adjust electricity bill charges based on specific criteria. This adjustment factor is applied quarterly to account for fluctuations in electricity production and purchasing costs. It directly impacts the total charges on electricity bills, ensuring that tariffs remain aligned with the current economic conditions affecting production costs. Overall, 收费调整系数 plays a crucial role in reflecting changes in the underlying costs associated with electricity production, thereby maintaining fairness and accuracy in billing.<SEP>收费调整系数is a variable factor that affects the overall charging fees, specifically noted for the second quarter of 2024.<SEP>收费调整系数is a quarterly adjustment factor applied to charging fees to reflect fluctuations in electricity production costs.<SEP>收费调整系数is a coefficient used to adjust the fees based on the electricity consumption.<SEP>收费调整系数refers to the adjustment coefficient applied to the billing based on electricity consumption.
电力收费调整系数是电力公司根据市场和政策变化调整电费的标准。

relationships.description: B组收费is adjusted based on the收费调整系数, which reflects fluctuations in electricity production costs.

"收费调整系数directly influences the calculation of充电费用, affecting the final amount charged.")<SEP>收费调整系数adjusts the charging fees quarterly based on fluctuations in electricity production costs.<SEP>收费调整系数is applied to adjust充电费用quarterly to reflect changes in electricity production costs.

收费调整系数affects the calculation of电费by adjusting for fluctuations in production costs.<SEP>收费调整系数is applied to adjust the final电费based on specific criteria and consumption levels.<SEP>收费调整系数affects the total电费that customers pay, which is part of the subsidy calculation.
收费调整系数在Electricity Bill中反映电力成本的变化。
收费调整系数影响D组收费的调整，反映电力生产和购买成本的变化。

query: 電子賬單如何申請電子賬單服務？
response:
### 申请电子账单服务的步骤

要申请电子账单服务，您需准备好电费单（包含合同号码）及个人资料，然后点击「立即申请」填写表格。您可以选择通过电子邮件或手机推送通知接收账单，若选择电子邮件，请在申请后登录邮箱点击邮件中的启用链接以激活服务。服务激活后，您将通过选定的方式接收账单通知。

####
answer: 請準備好您的電費單（內含合約號碼）及個人資料，按此「立即申請」。您亦可透過澳電APP、資詢通（28339911）、傳真（28339912）、郵寄、電郵、或親臨澳電客戶聯繫中心辦理相關手續。

Sale of Electricity
17. Metering of energy and demand  (17)
17.1 In general, energy consumed and demand subscribed by the Customer 
are evaluated through direct measurement performed with metering 
equipment and respective fittings.
17.2 Metering equipment and respective fittings, of the type that has been 
officially approved and duly calibrated and sealed, required for billing, 
are supplied, installed and maintained solely by the Company.
17.3 The reading of the Customer’s meter is performed periodically, in 
preestablished days, the date thereof shall be written on the bill of the 
latest month.
17.4 If reading is not performed on a monthly basis or if reading has not 
been taken due to Customer’s absence or any other reason imputable 
thereto, the bill shall be issued pursuant to paragraph 19.3 hereof.
17.5 If due to systematic absence or other reason imputable to the 
Customer, the reading is not performed for four consecutive months, 
the Company reserves the right to suspend electricity supply to the 
Customer, notwithstanding any action deemed necessary for the 
settlement of any debts due.
18. Tariffs  (18)
 Electricity tariffs and tariff periods are fixed by the Macau Special 
Administrative Region.",

{
    "page_content": "85Standard Conditions of Supply of Electricity Ė
19. Billing and collection  (19)
19.1 Electricity consumed is billed on a monthly basis, pursuant to a tariff 
system ﬁxed by the Macau Special Administrative Region.
19.2 The Company shall deliver the bill, whereof the consumption, the 
elements necessary to its veri ﬁcation and the amount due are contained, 
at the site of consumption or any other location indicated by the 
Customer, within a maximum period of three working days from the 
reading.
19.3 If by reasons imputable to the Customer, or by force majeure, the meter 
could not be read, the bill shall be issued for the corresponding period 
according to the average of consumption recorded during the previous 
twelve months or, if such is not feasible, the average of the consumption 
recorded to date, whereof corresponding demand is always due.
19.4 The consumption referred to under the previous paragraph shall be 
cleared against the billing of subsequent readings, whereof the bill is 
computed through relevant tariff.
19.5 The payment of the bill is due in a maximum of ﬁfteen days, counted 
from the reading date, at the ofﬁce of the Company or through institutions 
and methods indicated on the back of the bill.
19.6 In the same manner and within the same term, the Customer is obliged to 
pay the services rendered by the Company as well as any legal charges 
due.
19.7 The Customer shall by no means whatsoever retain or deduct any part 
of the amount due.
19.8 Failure to pay the bill on or before the payment due date, which shall be 
written on the bill, is levied with a surcharge over the amount due, ﬁxed 
by the Macau Special Administrative Region, whereof the Company 
may also suspend the energy supply after ﬁve working days from such 
date.",

{
    "page_content": "社援收费申请条件：凡被澳门社会工作局列入社会援助计划的住宅客户，其订定功率在6.9千伏安以下，且最近6个月内的每月耗电量在120度或以下。申请人需提供由澳门社会工作局发出的有效社会援助卡。若符合上述条件，本公司将在申请后自动按此项收费计算。

价格：
- 订定功率功率费用为：至6.9千伏安时，功率费用为0澳门元，电能费用为0.429澳门元/度。

电费单范例：
- 电费为100度，电能费用为0.429澳门元/度，总金额为42.90澳门元。
- 收费调整系数为100度，调整费用为0.340澳门元/度，总金额为34.00澳门元。
- 政府税按公式0.75 x √6.9计算，税额为2.00澳门元。
- 最终合计金额为78.90澳门元。

备注：根据2022年6月27日第25/2022号行政法规则和第105/2022号行政长官批示。
",

    }
}

{
    "page_content": "社福收费申请条件为在社会福利领域开展非营利且公认为重要的活动的公共或私人实体；需提供由权限主管部门发出的有关从事非牟利及社会活动性质的证明文件。

价格：
- 3.4千伏安以下的功率费为8.224澳门元，电能费用为0.884澳门元/度。
- 3.4至6.9千伏安的功率费为18.796澳门元。
- 6.9千伏安以上的功率费为3.372澳门元/千伏安。

电费单范例：
- 功率为13.8千伏安，功率费为3.372澳门元，金额为46.53澳门元。
- 电费为400度，电能费用为0.884澳门元/度，金额为353.60澳门元。
- 收费调整系数为400度，调整费用为0.340澳门元/度，金额为136.00澳门元。
- 政府税按公式0.75 x √13.8计算，金额为2.80澳门元。
- 合共金额为538.93澳门元。

备注：此费用标准根据2022年6月27日第25/2022号行政法规及第105/2022号行政长官批示。",

{
    "page_content": "转名 申请人: 必须为业权人或租户  
所需文件:  
1. 业权人身份证明文件副本  
2. 最近三个月发出的查屋纸  
3. 电费单  
如申请人为租户，另须提供:  
1. 租户的身份证明文件副本  
2. 已公证的租约副本  
如申请单位为非住宅用途，另须提供:  
1. “电力装置用途/电业工程人员声明书”及土地工务局发出的电力装置使用许可证  
应付费用: 申请合同尚未缴付的电费按金 (根据所申请的订定功率收取)  
所需时间: 即时办理  
备注: 如申请人未能亲身办理申请，可签署授权书以委托他人代办。  
[2] 澳门居民身份证、香港居民身份证、中华人民共和国居民身份证或各国护照。
[3] 如申请人为公司/社团，须提供最近三个月发出的公司商业/社团登记副本及其电能供应合约须由法定代表人签署。
[4] 如最近三个月发出的查屋纸仍未更改为新的业权人，客户可再递交经律师见证的买卖楼宇合约／银行三方约／屋契／物业转移税单（M1&M2）副本作参考，但需审批。
[5] 如以租户身份申请，则无需提供业权人的身份证明文件副本。
[6] 此声明书须由申请人或公司/ 社团的法定代表人签署。「电业工程人员声明书」部份只适用于具备电力装置使用准照的供电申请及更改订定功率申请。
[7] 指电力装置属第35 /2011 号行政法规的适用范围内。
[8] 指澳电已确认申请人所提交之文件，并已缴付相应费用。",

{
    "page_content": "86
20. Metering and billing errors (20)
20.1 Whenever errors or anomalies are found in energy and demand 
metering, such must be corrected through available elements.
20.2 In order to perform such correction, the Company must consider the 
characteristics of the Customer’s installation, its operational schedule, 
the latest bills presented before the detection of such error or anomaly, 
the amounts read after the correction of such error or anomaly and any 
other elements that may contribute to a more exact computation of the 
amount in question.
20.3 The limit of the amount demandable for credits which result from the 
correction of metering errors or anomalies, shall be determined by 
the sum of the amounts corresponding to the corrections applicable 
to a maximum period of twelve months prior to the month wherein 
any one of the parties expressly noti ﬁed the other of such error or 
anomaly, added the amount corresponding to the corrections to be 
made, up to the date wherein such error or anomaly was repaired.
20.4 The amount due shall not accrue interest and the payment thereof may 
be performed within a period equal to that wherein the error or anomaly 
has lasted, provided such period is no longer than six months.
20.5 Failure to pay any debits due on the part of the Customer from 
corrections hereinbefore referred to, within the established term, shall 
set the Customer under the nonpayment provisions of clause 19.
20.6 The hereinbefore provided shall also apply in case of error in reading 
and billing energy consumption.
20.7 In case of error in favor of the Company, the same shall issue a credit 
note in favor of the Customer, which may be used to pay for subsequent 
bill or bills or be received in cash at the Company’s cashiers.",

公共充电

{
    "page_content": "时刻保持警惕　慎防伪冒讯息

 1. 真正的澳电的通讯方式：
   - 电邮：customer.centre@cem-macau.com；info@cem-macau.com
   - 网上服务：[https://e-service.cem-macau.com/](https://e-service.cem-macau.com/)
   - 网站：[https://www.cem-macau.com](https://www.cem-macau.com)
   - 短讯：853660128339933 或 853660163050000

2. 如果接到可疑电邮、来电或讯息，应采取的措施：
   - 如接到可疑来电，应保持冷静并即时挂断电话
   - 切勿点击短讯或电邮内的任何连结或下载任何附件
   - 检查连结的网页是否使用澳电的官方域名，即 cem-macau.com或cem.mo
   - 立即删除可疑短讯或电邮
   - 如有怀疑，请致电资询通2833 9911或电邮至customer.centre@cem-macau.com，亦可亲临澳电客服中心，并提供可疑短讯或电邮的来电号码、寄件者的电邮地址、内容或截图，以供核实。

3. 若怀疑被骗，应怎么办：
   - 如你怀疑被骗，请尽快向警方寻求协助。
   - 如怀疑接到诈骗电话或存在相关犯罪时，可致电司法警察局24小时防诈骗查询热线 8800 7777。
   - 如要报案，请致电司法警察局报案热线993。详情请浏览司法警察局网站。

该信息可以帮助用户识别和应对潜在的诈骗信息。",

        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/stayalertforphishing/",

    }
}

entities.description: Online Services allow customers to manage their electricity accounts, track application progress, and make inquiries.
The Billing and Collection Process outlines the procedures for issuing bills and collecting payments for electricity services.
Billing Procedures outline the methods and timelines for charging Customers for their electricity consumption based on meter readings.
This category includes various application forms and declarations related to electricity services provided by CEM.
Customer Service encompasses various support options for customers to manage their electricity accounts and resolve issues.
The Electricity Billing System refers to the procedures and regulations governing the billing and collection of electricity consumption.
充电流程describes the steps involved in using public charging services, from account setup to payment.
This URL represents the online service platform provided by澳电for customer interactions and inquiries.
The Correction Process outlines the steps taken by the Company to rectify errors in energy metering and billing, including customer notifications and adjustments.
电子邮件是接收电子账单的另一种方式，需点击启用链接后生效。
申请程序是指申请社会服务计划所需遵循的步骤，包括网上申请和通过电邮或传真申请。

relationships.description: 澳电提供电子账单服务，允许客户选择以电子方式接收账单。
Online Services are part of澳电's offerings, allowing customers to manage their accounts and track applications online.
The Company implements Billing Procedures to charge the Customer based on Meter Readings.
The Company bills customers based on their electricity consumption, which is measured monthly.
The Company operates within the Electricity Billing System to manage billing and collection of electricity consumption from customers.
The Company implements the Billing and Collection Process to manage how bills are issued and payments are collected.
自助服务机provides an electronic option for customers to pay their electricity bills as part of电费缴交.
大西洋银行provides free bill payment options for electricity as part of电费缴交.
中国银行offers services that allow customers to pay their electricity bills as part of电费缴交.
广发澳门provides free bill payment services for electricity, enhancing电费缴交options.
The Meter Reading is conducted to assess the Customer's electricity consumption for billing purposes.
The Customer benefits from Billing Corrections, which ensure they are charged accurately for their energy consumption.
Billing errors directly affect the Customer's financial obligations and require resolution by the Company.
The Customer is involved in the Correction Process, which includes notifications and adjustments related to their billing errors.
The Company implements Billing Corrections to address any discrepancies found in customer bills due to metering errors.
优先缴费及柜台服务is an initiative by澳电to provide priority payment services for specific community members.
This URL represents the online service platform provided by澳电for customer interactions and inquiries.
电子支付is another method available under电费缴交for customers to pay their bills electronically.
账单通知是客户在启用电子账单服务后收到的确认信息。
电子邮件是接收电子账单的方式之一，需通过启用链接确认。

augmented_query: How do I apply for electronic bill services in my region? What are the steps required to enroll in the electronic billing service?

query: 如何啟用電子賬單服務？
response:
### 如何启用电子账单服务？

要启用电子账单服务，您需要申请并确认。在通过电子邮件接收账单的情况下，申请后需登录邮箱点击启用链接以激活服务。而如果选择通过手机简讯或应用程序接收，则服务将在申请后即时生效。请确保您准备好电费单和个人资料，完成申请后即可享受电子账单带来的便利。

####
answer: I. 以電郵方式收取：申請後需登入郵箱點擊郵件內的啟用鏈結，服務隨即生效。II. 以手機短訊收取：申請後即時生效。III. 以推送通知方式（澳電微信/ 澳電APP）收取：請關注澳電微信及綁定澳電網上服務賬戶；或於申請後下載澳電APP，登入澳電網上服務並新增電費單合約，服務隨即生效。

{
    "page_content": "如新单位/舖位已有电力供应，请申请合约转名 了解更多 立即申请

加大/减细电表 更改订定功率以满足您的用电需要 了解更多 立即申请

电力加大评估 提前规划，先向澳电查询单位的电力供应状况及更改订定功率的可行性 了解更多 立即申请

搬出旧单位/舖位的相关手续 取消电表 申请终止供电合约并退回按金 了解更多 立即申请

退按金 退回已终止合约的按金 了解更多 立即申请

截数账单 完成交易前，计算好未缴交的电费

网上服务
即时了解申请的最新进度 追纵申请进度 即时查看已提交的申请进度 追纵进度 

补交文件 补交 

设定账单 登入至网上服务并于"管理合约"中设置: - 更改账单语言- 电子账单- 更改账单邮寄地址- 缴费提示 

电费援助
长者电费援助计划 合资格的长者客户可享有每月首88度用电量的11%折扣优惠 了解更多 立即申请

社援收费 持有澳门社会工作局发出的有效社会援助卡可申请有关优惠 了解更多 立即申请

社福收费 从事于社会活动的非牟利公营或私营机构可申请有关优惠 了解更多 

私人电动车供电申请 咨询供电方案 申请前，先咨询供电方案，我们会为您评估供电方案的可行性 了解更多 立即申请

客户服务
随时查询、缴交、调整您的电费单 

查阅账单 您可透过以下方法查询:- 网上服务- 聊天机械人法仔- 澳电微信- 澳电客户服务中心(澳门/氹仔)- 致电资询通 28339911，报告事故 停电查询 电表测试 功率计算器

    "page_content": "84
Sale of Electricity
17. Metering of energy and demand  (17)
17.1 In general, energy consumed and demand subscribed by the Customer 
are evaluated through direct measurement performed with metering 
equipment and respective fittings.
17.2 Metering equipment and respective fittings, of the type that has been 
officially approved and duly calibrated and sealed, required for billing, 
are supplied, installed and maintained solely by the Company.
17.3 The reading of the Customer’s meter is performed periodically, in 
preestablished days, the date thereof shall be written on the bill of the 
latest month.
17.4 If reading is not performed on a monthly basis or if reading has not 
been taken due to Customer’s absence or any other reason imputable 
thereto, the bill shall be issued pursuant to paragraph 19.3 hereof.
17.5 If due to systematic absence or other reason imputable to the 
Customer, the reading is not performed for four consecutive months, 
the Company reserves the right to suspend electricity supply to the 
Customer, notwithstanding any action deemed necessary for the 
settlement of any debts due.
18. Tariffs  (18)
 Electricity tariffs and tariff periods are fixed by the Macau Special 
Administrative Region.",

{
    "page_content": "85Standard Conditions of Supply of Electricity Ė
19. Billing and collection  (19)
19.1 Electricity consumed is billed on a monthly basis, pursuant to a tariff 
system ﬁxed by the Macau Special Administrative Region.
19.2 The Company shall deliver the bill, whereof the consumption, the 
elements necessary to its veri ﬁcation and the amount due are contained, 
at the site of consumption or any other location indicated by the 
Customer, within a maximum period of three working days from the 
reading.
19.3 If by reasons imputable to the Customer, or by force majeure, the meter 
could not be read, the bill shall be issued for the corresponding period 
according to the average of consumption recorded during the previous 
twelve months or, if such is not feasible, the average of the consumption 
recorded to date, whereof corresponding demand is always due.
19.4 The consumption referred to under the previous paragraph shall be 
cleared against the billing of subsequent readings, whereof the bill is 
computed through relevant tariff.
19.5 The payment of the bill is due in a maximum of ﬁfteen days, counted 
from the reading date, at the ofﬁce of the Company or through institutions 
and methods indicated on the back of the bill.
19.6 In the same manner and within the same term, the Customer is obliged to 
pay the services rendered by the Company as well as any legal charges 
due.
19.7 The Customer shall by no means whatsoever retain or deduct any part 
of the amount due.
19.8 Failure to pay the bill on or before the payment due date, which shall be 
written on the bill, is levied with a surcharge over the amount due, ﬁxed 
by the Macau Special Administrative Region, whereof the Company 
may also suspend the energy supply after ﬁve working days from such 
date.",

    "page_content": "
了解我的账单

1. 合约号：当查询供电事宜或账单时，请提供此号码。
2. 应付总金额：应缴费用的总数。
3. 到期付款日：客户须于此日期或之前缴付电费。若逾期缴费，将在下月账单内征收逾期附加费。
4. 自动转账资料（只适用于自动转账客户）：此栏印有自动转账的银行名称及过数日期。
5. 下月抄表日期：安排于此日期抄读用电度数。
6. 用电时期：上月抄表日期至本月抄表日期及之间的用电天数。
7. 用电量（度）：将本月读数与上月读数相减，再乘以乘数值。
8. 按金：按订定功率值（电表大小）计算，用以保证客户依时缴付所有电费。
9. 收费调整系数：按季度调整以反映电力生产和购买之成本上的浮动。
10. 政府税：就每月使用电力装置所需缴纳的税项。",

    }
}

{
    "page_content": "为台风季节作好准备
接收/查询供电讯息渠道
‧留意澳电网站、Facebook专页及微信分5个阶段发布的讯息：
1 提醒准备的预警；
2 即将实施暂停供电警示；
3 已暂停供电；
4 开始复电；
5 完成复电。
‧关注澳电微信并绑定电费单/网上服务帐户或关注大厦，接收供电推送讯息。
‧台风期间，于澳电网站输入大厦名称查询大厦的供电情况。
如遇电力事故，可扫瞄二维码向我们报告。
台风来临前作好准备
‧ 准备环保充电式或手摇式电筒；
‧ 若家中有维持生命的电动仪器，安排后备电源或其他应变措施；
‧ 不要把电器放近窗边，以免被风雨沾湿受损；
‧ 不要触碰浸湿的电力设施；
‧ 如室内出现水浸情况，应立即关上配电箱总掣；
‧ 大厦供电系统可能会受水浸影响而断电，切勿乘坐升降机。

‧ 澳电微信
‧ 关注大厦
‧ 查询停电状态",
    "metadata": {
        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/uploads/pdf_education_typhoon_C_zh_3c3a9d5ee4.pdf",

    }
}

{
    "page_content": "
1. 个人资料处理声明  
   - 澳电依据澳门第8/2005号《个人资料保护法》处理个人资料，资料包括姓名、地址、电话号码、电表号、身份证号码、电邮等。

2. 资料收集来源  
   - 来自用户主动提供、业务过程中产生的信息及其他合法途径。

3. 资料使用目的  
   - 提供及维护电力服务  
   - 账单处理与支付  
   - 客户服务与沟通  
   - 市场推广及宣传  
   - 法律合规及风险管理

4. 资料保护原则  
   - 只收集必要资料  
   - 资料安全保护，防止未经授权访问  
   - 未经同意不会披露给第三方，除非法律要求或合作提供服务

5. 资料保留期限  
   - 仅在达成目的期间保留，之后删除或匿名化处理

6. 用户权利  
   - 查阅、更正、删除个人资料  
   - 随时取消直销推广资料接收

7. 身份验证  
   - 核实用户身份后处理相关请求

8. 投诉渠道  
   - 用户可向澳门个人资料保护办公室投诉

9. 联系方式  
   - 联系电邮：customer.centre@cem-macau.com  
   - 通讯地址：澳门马交石炮台马路澳电大楼

10. 声明更新  
    - 隐私声明可能不时更新，最新版本公布于官网

",
    "metadata": {
        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/privacy-statement/",
        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/privacy-statement/"
    }
}

{
    "page_content": "86
20. Metering and billing errors (20)
20.1 Whenever errors or anomalies are found in energy and demand 
metering, such must be corrected through available elements.
20.2 In order to perform such correction, the Company must consider the 
characteristics of the Customer’s installation, its operational schedule, 
the latest bills presented before the detection of such error or anomaly, 
the amounts read after the correction of such error or anomaly and any 
other elements that may contribute to a more exact computation of the 
amount in question.
20.3 The limit of the amount demandable for credits which result from the 
correction of metering errors or anomalies, shall be determined by 
the sum of the amounts corresponding to the corrections applicable 
to a maximum period of twelve months prior to the month wherein 
any one of the parties expressly noti ﬁed the other of such error or 
anomaly, added the amount corresponding to the corrections to be 
made, up to the date wherein such error or anomaly was repaired.
20.4 The amount due shall not accrue interest and the payment thereof may 
be performed within a period equal to that wherein the error or anomaly 
has lasted, provided such period is no longer than six months.
20.5 Failure to pay any debits due on the part of the Customer from 
corrections hereinbefore referred to, within the established term, shall 
set the Customer under the nonpayment provisions of clause 19.
20.6 The hereinbefore provided shall also apply in case of error in reading 
and billing energy consumption.

note in favor of the Customer, which may be used to pay for subsequent

{
    "page_content": "89Standard Conditions of Supply of Electricity Ė
23.3 When suspicion of fraudulent procedure arises, the Company shall 
request the presence of two witnesses, duly credentialed by competent 
authorities, to confirm or deny the existence of fraud.
23.4 When the existence of fraud is confirmed and imputable to the 
Customer, the Company reserves the right:
a) To be reimbursed for the amount corresponding to energy 
illicitly consumed and of any expenses related to the 
elimination of the fraud, namely the repair or replacement 
of damaged equipment;
b) To withhold supply until full payment is made of the amount 
due according to the previous subparagraph.
24. Value of energy illicitly consumed  (24)
24.1 The value of the energy illicitly consumed is computed by the 
Company, based on the highest tariff set for the subgroup contracted 
by the Customer, plus 25%, taking into account all the facts relevant 
to the computation of real consumption during the period wherein 
the fraudulent procedure took place, namely the characteristics of the 
installation, its schedule of operation, previous readings, if any, and 
posterior readings, if necessary.
24.2 When there are no elements to allow an objective computation of 
energy illicitly consumed, the relevant value is computed using the 
following rules:
a) Low-voltage Customers
Pc up to 20.7 kV A ................. 50-hour monthly usage of Pc
Pc from 34.5kV A to 69 kV ..... 70-hour monthly usage of Pc
Pc from 100 kV A to 340 kV A .100-hour monthly usage of Pc
Pc above 340 kV A ........... 200-hour monthly usage of Pc
b) Medium-voltage Customers .... 300-hour monthly usage of Pc
Whereof “Pc” is the demand subscribed by the Customer
24.3 Estimation performed in the terms of the previous paragraph 
comprises the period in relation thereto proof was presented wherein 
such irregular consumption was maintained or, if such evidence does 
not exist, a period of thirty-six months.",

query: 我可以查閱過往的電子賬單嗎？
response:
### 查阅电子账单

您可以通过登录网上服务、澳电APP或使用澳电微信服务来查阅当月账单。此外，升级为合同持有人身份后，您还可以查阅过往12个月的账单。请确保您已经启用电子账单服务，以便顺利访问相关信息。

###
answer: 您可以透過登入網上服務、澳電APP或使用澳電微信服務查閱當月賬單。升級成為合約持有人身份後，更可查閱過往12個月的賬單。

截数账单 完成交易前，计算好未缴交的电费

网上服务
即时了解申请的最新进度 追纵申请进度 即时查看已提交的申请进度 追纵进度 

补交文件 补交 

设定账单 登入至网上服务并于"管理合约"中设置: - 更改账单语言- 电子账单- 更改账单邮寄地址- 缴费提示 

电费援助

社援收费 持有澳门社会工作局发出的有效社会援助卡可申请有关优惠 了解更多 立即申请

社福收费 从事于社会活动的非牟利公营或私营机构可申请有关优惠 了解更多 

私人电动车供电申请 咨询供电方案 申请前，先咨询供电方案，我们会为您评估供电方案的可行性 了解更多 立即申请

客户服务
随时查询、缴交、调整您的电费单

{
    "page_content": "时刻保持警惕　慎防伪冒讯息

 1. 真正的澳电的通讯方式：
   - 电邮：customer.centre@cem-macau.com；info@cem-macau.com
   - 网上服务：[https://e-service.cem-macau.com/](https://e-service.cem-macau.com/)
   - 网站：[https://www.cem-macau.com](https://www.cem-macau.com)
   - 短讯：853660128339933 或 853660163050000

2. 如果接到可疑电邮、来电或讯息，应采取的措施：
   - 如接到可疑来电，应保持冷静并即时挂断电话
   - 切勿点击短讯或电邮内的任何连结或下载任何附件
   - 检查连结的网页是否使用澳电的官方域名，即 cem-macau.com或cem.mo
   - 立即删除可疑短讯或电邮
   - 如有怀疑，请致电资询通2833 9911或电邮至customer.centre@cem-macau.com，亦可亲临澳电客服中心，并提供可疑短讯或电邮的来电号码、寄件者的电邮地址、内容或截图，以供核实。

3. 若怀疑被骗，应怎么办：
   - 如你怀疑被骗，请尽快向警方寻求协助。
   - 如怀疑接到诈骗电话或存在相关犯罪时，可致电司法警察局24小时防诈骗查询热线 8800 7777。
   - 如要报案，请致电司法警察局报案热线993。详情请浏览司法警察局网站。

该信息可以帮助用户识别和应对潜在的诈骗信息。",
    "metadata": {
        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/stayalertforphishing/",
        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/stayalertforphishing/"
    }
}

{
    "page_content": "
了解我的账单

1. 合约号：当查询供电事宜或账单时，请提供此号码。
2. 应付总金额：应缴费用的总数。
3. 到期付款日：客户须于此日期或之前缴付电费。若逾期缴费，将在下月账单内征收逾期附加费。
4. 自动转账资料（只适用于自动转账客户）：此栏印有自动转账的银行名称及过数日期。
5. 下月抄表日期：安排于此日期抄读用电度数。
6. 用电时期：上月抄表日期至本月抄表日期及之间的用电天数。
7. 用电量（度）：将本月读数与上月读数相减，再乘以乘数值。
8. 按金：按订定功率值（电表大小）计算，用以保证客户依时缴付所有电费。
9. 收费调整系数：按季度调整以反映电力生产和购买之成本上的浮动。
10. 政府税：就每月使用电力装置所需缴纳的税项。",
    "metadata": {
        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/billing-service/understand-my-bill/",
        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/billing-service/understand-my-bill/"
    }
}

    "page_content": "82
15.9 Notices of supply interruption shall contain a warning of live 
installations.
16. Suspension of supply  (16)
16.1 The Company may suspend the supply of electricity when any of the 
following events imputable to the Customer occur:
a) Noncompliance with provisions that aim to eliminate 
any type of disruption to network operation and other 
installations, as well as in concern to the safety of persons 
and property;
b) Impossibility to read meters as covered by clause 17 
hereof;
c) Opposition to inspection of installations within the 
appointed schedule;
d) Failure to pay bills for energy consumption and demand, as 
well as any additional charges and services, within the term 
provided;
e) Fraud, as provided under paragraph 23.4;
f) Failure to update the guarantee within the term provided 
after being served notice to that effect by the Company;
g) In the situation provided under paragraph 9.4;
h) Failure to regularize default situations provided under 
paragraph 1.4 or clause 22, hereof, within the term provided 
to that effect by the Company.
16.2 Interruption of supply in situation provided under the previous 
paragraph shall not exempt the Customer from possible civil or 
criminal liability.
16.3 In the case provided under subparagraph 16.1 d), the Company 
reserves the right to withhold reconnection from the Customer until 
all outstanding bills are paid and, if necessary, the guarantee referred 
to under clause 4, hereof duly replenished, wherefore reconnection is 
subject to the payment of a charge in the terms of the Law.",

{
    "page_content": "85Standard Conditions of Supply of Electricity Ė
19. Billing and collection  (19)
19.1 Electricity consumed is billed on a monthly basis, pursuant to a tariff 
system ﬁxed by the Macau Special Administrative Region.
19.2 The Company shall deliver the bill, whereof the consumption, the 
elements necessary to its veri ﬁcation and the amount due are contained, 
at the site of consumption or any other location indicated by the 
Customer, within a maximum period of three working days from the 
reading.
19.3 If by reasons imputable to the Customer, or by force majeure, the meter 
could not be read, the bill shall be issued for the corresponding period 
according to the average of consumption recorded during the previous 
twelve months or, if such is not feasible, the average of the consumption 
recorded to date, whereof corresponding demand is always due.
19.4 The consumption referred to under the previous paragraph shall be 
cleared against the billing of subsequent readings, whereof the bill is 
computed through relevant tariff.
19.5 The payment of the bill is due in a maximum of ﬁfteen days, counted 
from the reading date, at the ofﬁce of the Company or through institutions 
and methods indicated on the back of the bill.
19.6 In the same manner and within the same term, the Customer is obliged to 
pay the services rendered by the Company as well as any legal charges 
due.
19.7 The Customer shall by no means whatsoever retain or deduct any part 
of the amount due.
19.8 Failure to pay the bill on or before the payment due date, which shall be 
written on the bill, is levied with a surcharge over the amount due, ﬁxed 
by the Macau Special Administrative Region, whereof the Company 
may also suspend the energy supply after ﬁve working days from such 
date.",

    "page_content": "84
Sale of Electricity
17. Metering of energy and demand  (17)
17.1 In general, energy consumed and demand subscribed by the Customer 
are evaluated through direct measurement performed with metering 
equipment and respective fittings.
17.2 Metering equipment and respective fittings, of the type that has been 
officially approved and duly calibrated and sealed, required for billing, 
are supplied, installed and maintained solely by the Company.
17.3 The reading of the Customer’s meter is performed periodically, in 
preestablished days, the date thereof shall be written on the bill of the 
latest month.
17.4 If reading is not performed on a monthly basis or if reading has not 
been taken due to Customer’s absence or any other reason imputable 
thereto, the bill shall be issued pursuant to paragraph 19.3 hereof.
17.5 If due to systematic absence or other reason imputable to the 
Customer, the reading is not performed for four consecutive months, 
the Company reserves the right to suspend electricity supply to the 
Customer, notwithstanding any action deemed necessary for the 
settlement of any debts due.
18. Tariffs  (18)
 Electricity tariffs and tariff periods are fixed by the Macau Special 
Administrative Region.",

    "page_content": "86
20. Metering and billing errors (20)
20.1 Whenever errors or anomalies are found in energy and demand 
metering, such must be corrected through available elements.
20.2 In order to perform such correction, the Company must consider the 
characteristics of the Customer’s installation, its operational schedule, 
the latest bills presented before the detection of such error or anomaly, 
the amounts read after the correction of such error or anomaly and any 
other elements that may contribute to a more exact computation of the 
amount in question.
20.3 The limit of the amount demandable for credits which result from the 
correction of metering errors or anomalies, shall be determined by 
the sum of the amounts corresponding to the corrections applicable 
to a maximum period of twelve months prior to the month wherein 
any one of the parties expressly noti ﬁed the other of such error or 
anomaly, added the amount corresponding to the corrections to be 
made, up to the date wherein such error or anomaly was repaired.
20.4 The amount due shall not accrue interest and the payment thereof may 
be performed within a period equal to that wherein the error or anomaly 
has lasted, provided such period is no longer than six months.
20.5 Failure to pay any debits due on the part of the Customer from 
corrections hereinbefore referred to, within the established term, shall 
set the Customer under the nonpayment provisions of clause 19.
20.6 The hereinbefore provided shall also apply in case of error in reading 
and billing energy consumption.
20.7 In case of error in favor of the Company, the same shall issue a credit 
note in favor of the Customer, which may be used to pay for subsequent 
bill or bills or be received in cash at the Company’s cashiers.",

工银澳门允许客户打印纸质账单，提供与电子账单的替代服务。
客户可以通过澳电微信接收电子账单，增强了服务的可达性。
手机短讯是接收电子账单的一种方式，申请后即时生效。
The Customer benefits from Billing Corrections, which ensure they are charged accurately for their energy consumption.
Outstanding Bills must be paid by the Customer to avoid suspension of electricity supply by The Company.
The Customer is entitled to rights that protect their interests regarding electric supply and service quality.
Billing errors directly affect the Customer's financial obligations and require resolution by the Company.
The Company implements Billing Procedures to charge the Customer based on Meter Readings.
CEM Macau issues the Electricity Bill to customers detailing their electricity usage and charges.
The Company implements Billing Corrections to address any discrepancies found in customer bills due to metering errors.
政府税是Electricity Bill中包含的费用，客户需按月支付。
The Company implements the Billing and Collection Process to manage how bills are issued and payments are collected.
The Company operates within the Electricity Billing System to manage billing and collection of electricity consumption from customers.
The Customer's Electricity Consumption is monitored and billed by the Company based on usage over time.
账单通知是客户在启用电子账单服务后收到的确认信息。
The Customer must provide Notification to the Company when they identify errors in their billing or metering.
The Company issues a Credit Note to the Customer when overbilling occurs, allowing for adjustments in future payments.

query: 使用電子賬單後，如何取得地址證明？
response:
### 如何取得地址证明

使用电子账单后，您可以将其作为地址证明的一部分。在申请电力服务时，您需提交相关的身份验证文件，包括您的地址证明和其他必要的文件，如租约或业权证明。如果您的电子账单显示的地址与您申请时填写的一致，通常就能满足地址证明的要求。

**
answer: 每月發出的電子賬單能取代紙質賬單作為在政府或銀行服務中有效的地址證明。具体请咨询客服人员或查询官网。

{
    "page_content": "82
15.9 Notices of supply interruption shall contain a warning of live 
installations.
16. Suspension of supply  (16)
16.1 The Company may suspend the supply of electricity when any of the 
following events imputable to the Customer occur:
a) Noncompliance with provisions that aim to eliminate 
any type of disruption to network operation and other 
installations, as well as in concern to the safety of persons 
and property;
b) Impossibility to read meters as covered by clause 17 
hereof;
c) Opposition to inspection of installations within the 
appointed schedule;
d) Failure to pay bills for energy consumption and demand, as 
well as any additional charges and services, within the term 
provided;
e) Fraud, as provided under paragraph 23.4;
f) Failure to update the guarantee within the term provided 
after being served notice to that effect by the Company;
g) In the situation provided under paragraph 9.4;
h) Failure to regularize default situations provided under 
paragraph 1.4 or clause 22, hereof, within the term provided 
to that effect by the Company.
16.2 Interruption of supply in situation provided under the previous 
paragraph shall not exempt the Customer from possible civil or 
criminal liability.
16.3 In the case provided under subparagraph 16.1 d), the Company 
reserves the right to withhold reconnection from the Customer until 
all outstanding bills are paid and, if necessary, the guarantee referred 
to under clause 4, hereof duly replenished, wherefore reconnection is 
subject to the payment of a charge in the terms of the Law.",

    "page_content": "申请供电所需文件：
业权人身份证明文件副本

如申请人为租户，另须提供：
租户身份证明文件副本

如申请单位为非住宅用途，另须提供：
电力装置位置图（适用于申请功率高于20.7千伏安）
《电力装置用途/电业工程人员声明书》及其身份证明文件副本
土地工务局发出以申请人及订定功率申请的电力装置使用许可证
补充内容：
如果申请单位涉及特别用途或有其他特殊要求，需额外提交相关文件（例如特殊行业许可证、相关行政审批文件等）。
应付费用：
需缴交附加之电缆接驳费（如需要）
工程费用（如需要）
按金（根据所申请的订定功率收取）
补充内容：
按金费用是根据申请的功率来决定的，且通常在后续结算时进行调整。
费用标准可能根据实际情况有所变化，请参考澳电最新的收费表。
订定功率及按金费标准：
3.4千伏安 (1x16安培) 澳门币 65.00
6.9千伏安 (1x32安培) 澳门币 132.00
11.5千伏安 (1x50安培) 澳门币 219.00
13.8千伏安 (3x20安培) 澳门币 399.00
20.7千伏安 (3x32安培) 澳门币 598.00
34.5千伏安 (3x50安培) 澳门币 854.00
补充内容：
以上费用标准适用于不同功率要求的客户，具体费用可能会根据地区、项目复杂度或特定需求有所变化。
需要注意的是，标准费用适用于常规安装，对于高功率或特殊安装需求可能需要额外费用。
所需时间：
四个工作天内完成

客户的电力工程：步骤和要求的相关信息 补充内容：
客户需要按照规定的步骤进行工程申请，包括设计方案的审批、施工准备、设备安装等环节。
所有电力工程必须符合澳电的安全标准，并通过必要的验收程序。
电力加大评估及功率计算器的使用说明 补充内容：
澳电提供功率计算器工具，帮助客户评估所需的电力容量，并根据实际需求选择合适的功率。

[8] 此声明书须由申请人或公司/ 社团的法定代表人签署。「电业工程人员声明书」部份只适用于具备电力装置使用准照的供电申请及更改订定功率申请。

{
    "page_content": "私人电动车供电申请

申请前须知：申请人需就相关停车场/车位之登记分类并遵守以下法规: 若为独立业权之停车位，可根据第14/2017号法律《分层建筑物共同部分的管理法律制度》之相关规定，在楼宇入口的大堂及进行工程范围附近的显眼处张贴有关工程通知15日，同时如楼宇设有管委会，亦应一并以书面方式通知管委会；若以一独立停车场作为业权登记内的停车位(主要是2000年前以业权份额作登记)，须按民法典要求取得停车场三分之二业权人同意；倘若没有改变原有楼宇供电功率的情况下，则只须取得停车场二分之一业权人同意；若停车位业权登记属建筑物之共同部份，则须按第14/2017号法律《分层建筑物共同部分的管理法律制度》第二十九条第一款的要求，取得经出席会议的分层建筑物所有人的过半数票通过，且其份额至少须在分层建筑物总值中占百分之十五同意。

申请步骤：请向我们咨询供电可行性。取得供电可行性回复后，另需聘请 注册技术员 及 电业工程人员 编制安装充电设施的电力设计方案，并提交土地工务局审批。取得土地工务局核准的电力设计方案(即盖章图则)后，于图则上按查屋纸所示，清楚标示相关停车位名称或号码，再递交至澳电，我们就客户电力装置与电网的接驳进行规划。

所需文件：
1. 咨询供电可行性所需文件: 
   - 申请的订定功率-千瓦 (充电器大小) 
   - 由澳门物业登记局最近3个月内发出的停车位物业登记书面报告 (即查屋纸) 能清晰显示车位地点的资料(如大厦及车位平面图、图片等) 
2. 私人电动车供电申请所需文件: 
   - 业权人身份证明文件副本 
   - 由澳门物业登记局最近3个月内发出的停车位物业登记书面报告 (即查屋纸) 
   - 「电力装置用途/电业工程人员声明书」及其身份证明文件副本 
   - 土地工务局核准的电力设计方案(即盖章图则) 
   - 土地工务局发出以申请人及订定功率申请的电力装置使用准照 
   - 如申请人为租户，另须提供: 
     - 租户身分证明文件副本 
     - 已公证的租约副本 

应付费用 (根据所申请的订定功率收取): 
电缆接驳费按金

所需时间：
1. 咨询供电可行性：10个工作天内
2. 电表安装：客户及澳电工程完成及验收后，4个工作天内完成

备注：
[1] 如申请人未能亲身办理申请，可签署授权书以委托他人代办。 
[2] 由于建筑物原电力设计未有预留任何电量予停车位，建议私人停车位充电设施的订定功率为6.9千伏安。 
[3] 澳门居民身份证、香港居民身份证、中华人民共和国居民身份证或各国护照。 
[4] 如申请人为公司/社团，须提供最近三个月发出的公司商业/社团登记副本及其电能供应合约须由法定代表人签署。 
[5] 如最近三个月发出的查屋纸仍未更改为新的业权人，客户可再递交经律师见证的买卖楼宇合约／银行三方约／屋契／物业转移税单（M1&M2）副本作参考，但需审批。

以上信息对用户有实际参考价值。",

        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/applyev/request-power-for-private-ev-charging/"

}

申请条件：
•   凡被澳门社会工作局列入社会援助计划的住宅客户，其订定功率在6.9千伏安以下及最近6个月内的每月耗电量在120度或以下；
•   需提供由澳门社会工作局发出的有效社会援助卡；
•   一经申请，若客户符合上述的耗电量要求，本公司将自动以此项收费计算。

价格
订定功率, 功率费, 电能费用
至6.9千伏安, 0.0(澳门币), 0.429(澳门币/度)

电费, 100, 0.429, 42.90
收费调整系数, 100, 0.26, 26.00
政府税(0.75x √3.4), , , 1.40
合共, , , 70.30
",

{
    "page_content": "社援收费申请条件：凡被澳门社会工作局列入社会援助计划的住宅客户，其订定功率在6.9千伏安以下，且最近6个月内的每月耗电量在120度或以下。申请人需提供由澳门社会工作局发出的有效社会援助卡。若符合上述条件，本公司将在申请后自动按此项收费计算。

价格：
- 订定功率功率费用为：至6.9千伏安时，功率费用为0澳门元，电能费用为0.429澳门元/度。

电费单范例：
- 电费为100度，电能费用为0.429澳门元/度，总金额为42.90澳门元。
- 收费调整系数为100度，调整费用为0.340澳门元/度，总金额为34.00澳门元。
- 政府税按公式0.75 x √6.9计算，税额为2.00澳门元。
- 最终合计金额为78.90澳门元。

备注：根据2022年6月27日第25/2022号行政法规则和第105/2022号行政长官批示。
",
    "metadata": {
        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/billpaymentpromotion/social-tariff/",
        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/billpaymentpromotion/social-tariff/"
    }
}

{
    "page_content": "社福收费申请条件为在社会福利领域开展非营利且公认为重要的活动的公共或私人实体；需提供由权限主管部门发出的有关从事非牟利及社会活动性质的证明文件。

价格：
- 3.4千伏安以下的功率费为8.224澳门元，电能费用为0.884澳门元/度。
- 3.4至6.9千伏安的功率费为18.796澳门元。
- 6.9千伏安以上的功率费为3.372澳门元/千伏安。

电费单范例：
- 功率为13.8千伏安，功率费为3.372澳门元，金额为46.53澳门元。
- 电费为400度，电能费用为0.884澳门元/度，金额为353.60澳门元。
- 收费调整系数为400度，调整费用为0.340澳门元/度，金额为136.00澳门元。
- 政府税按公式0.75 x √13.8计算，金额为2.80澳门元。
- 合共金额为538.93澳门元。

备注：此费用标准根据2022年6月27日第25/2022号行政法规及第105/2022号行政长官批示。",

{
    "page_content": "新建成楼宇的供电

临时供电如果您正计划一个新的建筑项目，而有关政府部门已经批核您的电力计划，您可能需要为您的项目申请临时供电。 请出示下列文件：申请人身份证明文件副本，以公司名义的申请另需提供最近三个月发出的公司商业登记副本；一比一千的地籍图副本一份，指出有关临时供电掣箱座落地点；A4尺寸的说明书一份，内容包括：所需订定功率（千伏安）、余差电流保护器的运作电流（毫安）、引入线断路器的断流容量（千安）、供电用途（楼宇建筑或地基工程）及临时供电期限；临时供电掣箱安装图；电业工程人员声明书（及其身份证明文件副本）；土地工务运输局批出的基建工程、楼宇建筑工程或公共基建工程准照副本。

应付费用：分担费用，按下列临时装置工程的种类而定：新建楼宇建筑工程公共基建工程按金按订定功率计算。

所需时间：临时供电的接驳视乎电力装置的实地安装批核，有关费用的缴付及需要本公司执行的工程性质而定。当获得民政总署批出准照后，低压供电可于10个工作天内完成。当变压房土建工程验收后，中压供电可于30日内完成。

备注：澳门居民身份证、香港居民身份证、中华人民共和国居民身份证或各国护照。

新楼宇供电如果相关的政府部门已经批核您的项目，您可联络我们就新楼宇与电网之间的接驳作出规划。 请出示下列文件：申请人身份证明文件副本，以公司名义的申请另需提供最近三个月发出的公司商业登记副本；一比一千的地籍图副本一份及其电子文档；土地工务局批出已盖印的电力计划（包括说明书、电气图则及申请的功率表等）副本一份及其电子文档 (PDF)；土地工务局批出的建筑楼宇工程准照副本一份及其电子文档；土地工务局批出已盖印的楼宇分层独立单位面积说明书副本一份及其电子文档 (Excel)；电业工程承办商声明书（及其身份证明文件副本）。

应付费用：根据2005年7月18日之第11/2005号行政法规及2005年7月18日之第31/2005行政命令，新建楼宇之分担费是按照该楼宇申请功率而计算。

所需时间：由承建商所负责的工作包括集合设施、引入电线及变电房土建工程（如有需要）完成及批准，并缴付有关费用及在有关政府部门批出本公司的工程准照后六十天内执行有关新楼宇的供电接驳；本公司欢迎与申请人洽商一个适合双方的期限。

供电前低压装置验收：新建筑物在接入澳电电网前，承办商须向澳电申请低压装置验收，并提交以下文件:最新的竣工图；低压总掣柜或总掣板的单线图及厂方测试报告；低压装置验收表 (IAF-CN-01)澳电收到上述文件后将联络客户安排现场验收。

备注：澳门居民身份证、香港居民身份证、中华人民共和国居民身份证或各国护照。

拆除电力基建设备如果您需要清拆一幢楼宇或设施，请于事前联络我们，以便我们拆除原有的电力基建设备。 请出示下列文件：申请人身份证明文件副本，以公司名义的申请另需提供最近三个月发出的公司商业登记副本；一比一千的地籍图副本两份；由土地工务局批出的拆卸、翻新、地基或建筑工程准照副本一份（如有需要）。

应付费用：如需缴付，申请人将被知会根据由澳门特区政府批核之单价列表而计算的工程费用。

所需时间：按本公司所执行的工程性质而定。当获得民政总署批出准照后，通常可于20日内完成低压或街灯工程及30日内完成中压工程。

备注：澳门居民身份证、香港居民身份证、中华人民共和国居民身份证或各国护照。",
    "metadata": {
        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/business/supply-connection-for-new-building/",
        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/business/supply-connection-for-new-building/"
    }
}

任何客户

(1) 如申请人未能亲身办理申请，可签署授权书以委托他人代办。
(2) 如申请涉及合并单位，另须提供土地工务局核准的更改工程(修改)计划。

(4) 如申请人为公司/社团，须提供最近三个月发出的公司商业/社团登记副本及其电能供

宇合约／银行三方约／屋契／物业转移税单（M1&M2）副本作参考，但需审批。

(12)申请单位必须为空置。

entities.description: Online Services allow customers to manage their electricity accounts, track application progress, and make inquiries.

entities.entity: 租户身份证明文件副本
entities.description: 租户身份证明文件副本是租户在申请电力服务时需要提供的身份验证文件。
租户身分证明文件是租户在申请供电时需提交的文件，证明其租赁身份。

The applicant, referred to as 申请人, is defined as the individual or entity that holds the electricity supply contract or is the property owner. This entity is responsible for requesting the termination of the electricity supply and must provide identification documents when applying for changes in power capacity. Additionally, the applicant can also refer to any customer seeking the electricity meter inspection service or submitting a request for a meter change. Furthermore, the applicant is the individual or entity that must submit a refund request, reinforcing the requirement that they must be the holder of the electricity supply contract. Overall, the applicant plays a crucial role in various processes related to electricity supply management, including contract termination, meter inspections, power adjustments, and refund applications.<SEP>申请人是指向相关部门申请供电的个人或公司，需提供身份证明和其他文件。
供电所需文件是申请电力服务时需要提交的各种文件，包括身份证明和租约等。

relationships.description: Outstanding Bills must be paid by the Customer to avoid suspension of electricity supply by The Company.
The applicant must submit the电费单to show proof of payment for electricity as part of the application process.<SEP>申请人需提交电费单作为申请终止合约的必要文件。

relationships.description: 查屋纸is a required document for the electricity supply application as specified in the供电指南.

The applicant must provide the身份证明文件to verify their identity when applying for termination.<SEP>申请人需提供身份证明文件以证明其身份，满足申请条件。<SEP>申请人需要提供身份证明文件以确认其身份，作为申请的一部分。<SEP>申请人需提交身份证明文件以确认其身份，作为申请供电的必要条件。

申请人可提供各国护照的副本，以证明其身份并办理电表更改申请。

If the查屋纸has not been updated, the applicant may need to submit it for verification, indicating a documentation requirement.<SEP>如果申请人为现时业权人，需提供查屋纸以证明其所有权。<SEP>申请人如有需要，需提供查屋纸以供审批。<SEP>The applicant must provide the查屋纸to verify property ownership when applying for termination.

augmented_query: How can I obtain a proof of address using an electronic bill? What documents are accepted as proof of address?

query: 我可以在哪裡列印紙質賬單？
response:
### 线下纸质账单打印服务

您可以在工银澳门的分行打印纸质账单。此外，澳门自来水的客户服务中心也提供打印服务。请确保携带必要的身份证明文件以便于处理。

####
answer: 除了澳電及澳門自來水的客戶服務中心外，您亦可到工銀澳門位於信步閑庭、合富及寰宇天下分行列印賬單。

{
    "page_content": "86
20. Metering and billing errors (20)
20.1 Whenever errors or anomalies are found in energy and demand 
metering, such must be corrected through available elements.
20.2 In order to perform such correction, the Company must consider the 
characteristics of the Customer’s installation, its operational schedule, 
the latest bills presented before the detection of such error or anomaly, 
the amounts read after the correction of such error or anomaly and any 
other elements that may contribute to a more exact computation of the 
amount in question.
20.3 The limit of the amount demandable for credits which result from the 
correction of metering errors or anomalies, shall be determined by 
the sum of the amounts corresponding to the corrections applicable 
to a maximum period of twelve months prior to the month wherein 
any one of the parties expressly noti ﬁed the other of such error or 
anomaly, added the amount corresponding to the corrections to be 
made, up to the date wherein such error or anomaly was repaired.
20.4 The amount due shall not accrue interest and the payment thereof may 
be performed within a period equal to that wherein the error or anomaly 
has lasted, provided such period is no longer than six months.
20.5 Failure to pay any debits due on the part of the Customer from 
corrections hereinbefore referred to, within the established term, shall 
set the Customer under the nonpayment provisions of clause 19.
20.6 The hereinbefore provided shall also apply in case of error in reading 
and billing energy consumption.
20.7 In case of error in favor of the Company, the same shall issue a credit 
note in favor of the Customer, which may be used to pay for subsequent 
bill or bills or be received in cash at the Company’s cashiers.",

15.9 Notices of supply interruption shall contain a warning of live 
installations.
16. Suspension of supply  (16)
16.1 The Company may suspend the supply of electricity when any of the 
following events imputable to the Customer occur:
a) Noncompliance with provisions that aim to eliminate 
any type of disruption to network operation and other 
installations, as well as in concern to the safety of persons 
and property;
b) Impossibility to read meters as covered by clause 17 
hereof;
c) Opposition to inspection of installations within the 
appointed schedule;
d) Failure to pay bills for energy consumption and demand, as 
well as any additional charges and services, within the term 
provided;
e) Fraud, as provided under paragraph 23.4;
f) Failure to update the guarantee within the term provided 
after being served notice to that effect by the Company;
g) In the situation provided under paragraph 9.4;
h) Failure to regularize default situations provided under 
paragraph 1.4 or clause 22, hereof, within the term provided 
to that effect by the Company.
16.2 Interruption of supply in situation provided under the previous 
paragraph shall not exempt the Customer from possible civil or 
criminal liability.
16.3 In the case provided under subparagraph 16.1 d), the Company 
reserves the right to withhold reconnection from the Customer until 
all outstanding bills are paid and, if necessary, the guarantee referred 
to under clause 4, hereof duly replenished, wherefore reconnection is 
subject to the payment of a charge in the terms of the Law.",

Sale of Electricity
17. Metering of energy and demand  (17)
17.1 In general, energy consumed and demand subscribed by the Customer 
are evaluated through direct measurement performed with metering 
equipment and respective fittings.
17.2 Metering equipment and respective fittings, of the type that has been 
officially approved and duly calibrated and sealed, required for billing, 
are supplied, installed and maintained solely by the Company.
17.3 The reading of the Customer’s meter is performed periodically, in 
preestablished days, the date thereof shall be written on the bill of the 
latest month.
17.4 If reading is not performed on a monthly basis or if reading has not 
been taken due to Customer’s absence or any other reason imputable 
thereto, the bill shall be issued pursuant to paragraph 19.3 hereof.
17.5 If due to systematic absence or other reason imputable to the 
Customer, the reading is not performed for four consecutive months, 
the Company reserves the right to suspend electricity supply to the 
Customer, notwithstanding any action deemed necessary for the 
settlement of any debts due.
18. Tariffs  (18)
 Electricity tariffs and tariff periods are fixed by the Macau Special 
Administrative Region.",

{
    "page_content": "
了解我的账单

1. 合约号：当查询供电事宜或账单时，请提供此号码。
2. 应付总金额：应缴费用的总数。
3. 到期付款日：客户须于此日期或之前缴付电费。若逾期缴费，将在下月账单内征收逾期附加费。
4. 自动转账资料（只适用于自动转账客户）：此栏印有自动转账的银行名称及过数日期。
5. 下月抄表日期：安排于此日期抄读用电度数。
6. 用电时期：上月抄表日期至本月抄表日期及之间的用电天数。
7. 用电量（度）：将本月读数与上月读数相减，再乘以乘数值。
8. 按金：按订定功率值（电表大小）计算，用以保证客户依时缴付所有电费。
9. 收费调整系数：按季度调整以反映电力生产和购买之成本上的浮动。
10. 政府税：就每月使用电力装置所需缴纳的税项。",

        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/billing-service/understand-my-bill/",
        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/billing-service/understand-my-bill/"
    }
}

{
    "page_content": "85Standard Conditions of Supply of Electricity Ė
19. Billing and collection  (19)
19.1 Electricity consumed is billed on a monthly basis, pursuant to a tariff 
system ﬁxed by the Macau Special Administrative Region.
19.2 The Company shall deliver the bill, whereof the consumption, the 
elements necessary to its veri ﬁcation and the amount due are contained, 
at the site of consumption or any other location indicated by the 
Customer, within a maximum period of three working days from the 
reading.
19.3 If by reasons imputable to the Customer, or by force majeure, the meter 
could not be read, the bill shall be issued for the corresponding period 
according to the average of consumption recorded during the previous 
twelve months or, if such is not feasible, the average of the consumption 
recorded to date, whereof corresponding demand is always due.
19.4 The consumption referred to under the previous paragraph shall be 
cleared against the billing of subsequent readings, whereof the bill is 
computed through relevant tariff.
19.5 The payment of the bill is due in a maximum of ﬁfteen days, counted 
from the reading date, at the ofﬁce of the Company or through institutions 
and methods indicated on the back of the bill.
19.6 In the same manner and within the same term, the Customer is obliged to 
pay the services rendered by the Company as well as any legal charges 
due.
19.7 The Customer shall by no means whatsoever retain or deduct any part 
of the amount due.
19.8 Failure to pay the bill on or before the payment due date, which shall be 
written on the bill, is levied with a surcharge over the amount due, ﬁxed 
by the Macau Special Administrative Region, whereof the Company 
may also suspend the energy supply after ﬁve working days from such 
date.",

2.1 In addition to the acceptance by both parties of conditions provided 
under the standard contract, the electricity supply contract shall 
include the following elements:

the signing of the contract.

there is already a contract for the same location whose subscriber,

{
    "page_content": "申请供电所需文件：
业权人身份证明文件副本
最近三个月发出的查屋纸
如申请人为租户，另须提供：
租户身份证明文件副本
已公证的租约副本
如申请单位为非住宅用途，另须提供：
电力装置位置图（适用于申请功率高于20.7千伏安）
《电力装置用途/电业工程人员声明书》及其身份证明文件副本
土地工务局发出以申请人及订定功率申请的电力装置使用许可证
补充内容：
如果申请单位涉及特别用途或有其他特殊要求，需额外提交相关文件（例如特殊行业许可证、相关行政审批文件等）。
应付费用：
需缴交附加之电缆接驳费（如需要）
工程费用（如需要）
按金（根据所申请的订定功率收取）
补充内容：
按金费用是根据申请的功率来决定的，且通常在后续结算时进行调整。
费用标准可能根据实际情况有所变化，请参考澳电最新的收费表。
订定功率及按金费标准：
3.4千伏安 (1x16安培) 澳门币 65.00
6.9千伏安 (1x32安培) 澳门币 132.00
11.5千伏安 (1x50安培) 澳门币 219.00
13.8千伏安 (3x20安培) 澳门币 399.00
20.7千伏安 (3x32安培) 澳门币 598.00
34.5千伏安 (3x50安培) 澳门币 854.00
补充内容：
以上费用标准适用于不同功率要求的客户，具体费用可能会根据地区、项目复杂度或特定需求有所变化。
需要注意的是，标准费用适用于常规安装，对于高功率或特殊安装需求可能需要额外费用。
所需时间：
四个工作天内完成

客户的电力工程：步骤和要求的相关信息 补充内容：
客户需要按照规定的步骤进行工程申请，包括设计方案的审批、施工准备、设备安装等环节。
所有电力工程必须符合澳电的安全标准，并通过必要的验收程序。
电力加大评估及功率计算器的使用说明 补充内容：
澳电提供功率计算器工具，帮助客户评估所需的电力容量，并根据实际需求选择合适的功率。

[1] 如申请人未能亲身办理申请， 可签署授权书以委托他人代办。
[2] 如申请涉及合并单位，另须提供土地工务局核准的更改工程 (修改) 计划。
[3] 澳门居民身份证、香港居民身份证、中华人民共和国居民身份证或各国护照。
[4] 如申请人为公司/社团，须提供最近三个月发出的公司商业/社团登记副本及其电能供应合约须由法定代表人签署。
[5] 如最近三个月发出的查屋纸仍未更改为新的业权人，客户可再递交经律师见证的买卖楼宇合约／银行三方约／屋契／物业转移税单（M1&M2）副本作参考，但需审批。
[6] 如以租户身份申请，则无需提供业权人的身份证明文件副本。
[7] 位置图须清晰显示客户电力装置及电表的所在位置。如有需要，需提供进一步的资料。
[8] 此声明书须由申请人或公司/ 社团的法定代表人签署。「电业工程人员声明书」部份只适用于具备电力装置使用准照的供电申请及更改订定功率申请。
[9] 指电力装置属第3 5 /2 0 1 1 号行政法规的适用范围内。
[10] 指澳电可自由进出电力装置处。
[11] 不涉及任何客户或澳电工程，并已缴付相应费用。",
    "metadata": {
        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/apply/request-power/",
        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/apply/request-power/"
    }
}

{
    "page_content": "其他活动的临时供电

如果您的活动现场没有供电，或您的商业设备并非永久用途，您可申请临时电力供应。

请出示下列文件：  
申请人身份证明文件副本，  
以公司名义的申请另需提供最近三个月发出的公司商业登记副本；  
一比一千的地籍图副本一份，指出有关临时供电掣箱座落地点；  
A4尺寸的说明书一份，内容包括：所需订定功率（千伏安）、余差电流保护器的运作电流（毫安）、引入线断路器的断流容量（千安）、供电用途（工商展、博览会、节庆或其他短期活动）及临时供电期限；  
临时供电掣箱安装图；  
电业工程人员声明书（及其身份证明文件副本）；  
有关政府部门批出的工商展、博览会、节庆或其他短期活动准照副本。  

应付费用：分担费用，按临时装置工程的种类工商展、博览会、节庆或其他短期活动而定按金按订定功率计算。  

所需时间：临时供电的接驳视乎电力装置的实地安装批核，有关费用的缴付及需要本公司执行的工程性质而定。当获得民政总署批出准照后，低压供电可于10个工作天内完成。当变压房土建工程验收后，中压供电可于30日内完成。  

备注：澳门居民身份证、香港居民身份证、中华人民共和国居民身份证或各国护照。

如有任何疑问，请联络我们，我们随时为您服务。",
    "metadata": {
        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/business/temporary-supply-for-other-events/",
        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/business/temporary-supply-for-other-events/"
    }
}

{
    "page_content": "79Standard Conditions of Supply of Electricity Ė
13.2 The Customer is responsible and shall bear the cost of maintenance, 
repair and restoration involving the installation operated by the 
same, as well as service-entrance line, collective line distributing 
boxes, collective line and main collective switchboard or the main 
low-voltage switchboard, which are connected to the Customer’s 
installation.
13.3 The Company is responsible and shall bear the cost of maintenance, 
repair and replacement concerning the metering systems and protection 
devices pertaining thereto, except if the detected malfunction results 
from negligence or lack of care on the part of the Customer, in which 
case the costs shall be borne by the latter.
13.4 By express agreement between the parties, included in the supply 
contract, the Customer may undertake the responsibility to maintain, 
repair and restore the switching and transformer substation that serve 
exclusively its premises.
13.5 The Company reserves the right to claim compensation for material 
damage caused to the meter or any other equipment owned by the 
same and placed in the Customer’s premises, provided the liability of 
the latter may be proven.
13.6 The liability of the Customer does not cover loss or deterioration by 
accidental fire or any unpredicted event or force majeure pursuant 
to paragraph 15.2 hereof, neither any damage resulting from normal 
wear and tear to the equipment in question.
13.7 The Customer is obliged to notify the Company, at once, of any defect 
detected with the devices or their functioning, otherwise subject to 
liability for any damage in result of such defect. Such notice shall be

entities.description: Billing Corrections involve adjustments made to customer bills when errors or anomalies in metering are identified, ensuring fair charges.

entities.entity: 一站式中小企电力支援服务

自助服务机refers to automated machines that allow customers to pay their electricity bills electronically.

relationships.description: The Customer benefits from Billing Corrections, which ensure they are charged accurately for their energy consumption.
Outstanding Bills must be paid by the Customer to avoid suspension of electricity supply by The Company.
Billing errors directly affect the Customer's financial obligations and require resolution by the Company.
The Company implements Billing Procedures to charge the Customer based on Meter Readings.
政府税是Electricity Bill中包含的费用，客户需按月支付。
The Company bills customers based on their electricity consumption, which is measured monthly.
The Company operates within the Electricity Billing System to manage billing and collection of electricity consumption from customers.
建设银行offers free services for paying electricity bills, contributing to电费缴交.
立桥银行provides free bill payment services for electricity, contributing to电费缴交.
支票is a method of payment that falls under the category of电费缴交for settling electricity bills.
The Electricity Bill includes the Government Tax as part of the total amount due for electricity usage.

The Company may sign special contracts with large customers, subject to approval from the Macau Special Administrative Region.
客户are the recipients of the企业商号电费补贴, benefiting from the financial support provided.

query: 我可以同時收取電子賬單及紙質賬單嗎？
response:
### 是否可以同时收取电子账单和纸质账单？

您不能同时收取电子账单和纸质账单。为响应环保及减少用纸，您只能选择其中一项。如果成功申请使用电子账单，澳电将不再邮寄纸质账单。

####
answer: 為響應環保及減少用紙，您只可以選擇紙質賬單或電子賬單其中一項。成功申請使用電子賬單後，澳電不會再郵寄紙質賬單。

{
    "page_content": "86
20. Metering and billing errors (20)
20.1 Whenever errors or anomalies are found in energy and demand 
metering, such must be corrected through available elements.
20.2 In order to perform such correction, the Company must consider the 
characteristics of the Customer’s installation, its operational schedule, 
the latest bills presented before the detection of such error or anomaly, 
the amounts read after the correction of such error or anomaly and any 
other elements that may contribute to a more exact computation of the 
amount in question.
20.3 The limit of the amount demandable for credits which result from the 
correction of metering errors or anomalies, shall be determined by 
the sum of the amounts corresponding to the corrections applicable 
to a maximum period of twelve months prior to the month wherein 
any one of the parties expressly noti ﬁed the other of such error or 
anomaly, added the amount corresponding to the corrections to be 
made, up to the date wherein such error or anomaly was repaired.
20.4 The amount due shall not accrue interest and the payment thereof may 
be performed within a period equal to that wherein the error or anomaly 
has lasted, provided such period is no longer than six months.
20.5 Failure to pay any debits due on the part of the Customer from 
corrections hereinbefore referred to, within the established term, shall 
set the Customer under the nonpayment provisions of clause 19.
20.6 The hereinbefore provided shall also apply in case of error in reading 
and billing energy consumption.
20.7 In case of error in favor of the Company, the same shall issue a credit 
note in favor of the Customer, which may be used to pay for subsequent 
bill or bills or be received in cash at the Company’s cashiers.",

15.9 Notices of supply interruption shall contain a warning of live 
installations.
16. Suspension of supply  (16)
16.1 The Company may suspend the supply of electricity when any of the 
following events imputable to the Customer occur:
a) Noncompliance with provisions that aim to eliminate 
any type of disruption to network operation and other 
installations, as well as in concern to the safety of persons 
and property;
b) Impossibility to read meters as covered by clause 17 
hereof;
c) Opposition to inspection of installations within the 
appointed schedule;
d) Failure to pay bills for energy consumption and demand, as 
well as any additional charges and services, within the term 
provided;
e) Fraud, as provided under paragraph 23.4;
f) Failure to update the guarantee within the term provided 
after being served notice to that effect by the Company;
g) In the situation provided under paragraph 9.4;
h) Failure to regularize default situations provided under 
paragraph 1.4 or clause 22, hereof, within the term provided 
to that effect by the Company.
16.2 Interruption of supply in situation provided under the previous 
paragraph shall not exempt the Customer from possible civil or 
criminal liability.
16.3 In the case provided under subparagraph 16.1 d), the Company 
reserves the right to withhold reconnection from the Customer until 
all outstanding bills are paid and, if necessary, the guarantee referred 
to under clause 4, hereof duly replenished, wherefore reconnection is 
subject to the payment of a charge in the terms of the Law.",

    "page_content": "84
Sale of Electricity
17. Metering of energy and demand  (17)
17.1 In general, energy consumed and demand subscribed by the Customer 
are evaluated through direct measurement performed with metering 
equipment and respective fittings.
17.2 Metering equipment and respective fittings, of the type that has been 
officially approved and duly calibrated and sealed, required for billing, 
are supplied, installed and maintained solely by the Company.
17.3 The reading of the Customer’s meter is performed periodically, in 
preestablished days, the date thereof shall be written on the bill of the 
latest month.
17.4 If reading is not performed on a monthly basis or if reading has not 
been taken due to Customer’s absence or any other reason imputable 
thereto, the bill shall be issued pursuant to paragraph 19.3 hereof.
17.5 If due to systematic absence or other reason imputable to the 
Customer, the reading is not performed for four consecutive months, 
the Company reserves the right to suspend electricity supply to the 
Customer, notwithstanding any action deemed necessary for the 
settlement of any debts due.
18. Tariffs  (18)
 Electricity tariffs and tariff periods are fixed by the Macau Special 
Administrative Region.",

{
    "page_content": "85Standard Conditions of Supply of Electricity Ė
19. Billing and collection  (19)
19.1 Electricity consumed is billed on a monthly basis, pursuant to a tariff 
system ﬁxed by the Macau Special Administrative Region.
19.2 The Company shall deliver the bill, whereof the consumption, the 
elements necessary to its veri ﬁcation and the amount due are contained, 
at the site of consumption or any other location indicated by the 
Customer, within a maximum period of three working days from the 
reading.
19.3 If by reasons imputable to the Customer, or by force majeure, the meter 
could not be read, the bill shall be issued for the corresponding period 
according to the average of consumption recorded during the previous 
twelve months or, if such is not feasible, the average of the consumption 
recorded to date, whereof corresponding demand is always due.
19.4 The consumption referred to under the previous paragraph shall be 
cleared against the billing of subsequent readings, whereof the bill is 
computed through relevant tariff.
19.5 The payment of the bill is due in a maximum of ﬁfteen days, counted 
from the reading date, at the ofﬁce of the Company or through institutions 
and methods indicated on the back of the bill.
19.6 In the same manner and within the same term, the Customer is obliged to 
pay the services rendered by the Company as well as any legal charges 
due.
19.7 The Customer shall by no means whatsoever retain or deduct any part 
of the amount due.
19.8 Failure to pay the bill on or before the payment due date, which shall be 
written on the bill, is levied with a surcharge over the amount due, ﬁxed 
by the Macau Special Administrative Region, whereof the Company 
may also suspend the energy supply after ﬁve working days from such 
date.",

{
    "page_content": "
了解我的账单

1. 合约号：当查询供电事宜或账单时，请提供此号码。
2. 应付总金额：应缴费用的总数。
3. 到期付款日：客户须于此日期或之前缴付电费。若逾期缴费，将在下月账单内征收逾期附加费。
4. 自动转账资料（只适用于自动转账客户）：此栏印有自动转账的银行名称及过数日期。
5. 下月抄表日期：安排于此日期抄读用电度数。
6. 用电时期：上月抄表日期至本月抄表日期及之间的用电天数。
7. 用电量（度）：将本月读数与上月读数相减，再乘以乘数值。
8. 按金：按订定功率值（电表大小）计算，用以保证客户依时缴付所有电费。
9. 收费调整系数：按季度调整以反映电力生产和购买之成本上的浮动。
10. 政府税：就每月使用电力装置所需缴纳的税项。",
    "metadata": {
        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/billing-service/understand-my-bill/",
        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/billing-service/understand-my-bill/"
    }
}

{
    "page_content": "
1. 个人资料处理声明  
   - 澳电依据澳门第8/2005号《个人资料保护法》处理个人资料，资料包括姓名、地址、电话号码、电表号、身份证号码、电邮等。

2. 资料收集来源  
   - 来自用户主动提供、业务过程中产生的信息及其他合法途径。

3. 资料使用目的  
   - 提供及维护电力服务  
   - 账单处理与支付  
   - 客户服务与沟通  
   - 市场推广及宣传  
   - 法律合规及风险管理

4. 资料保护原则  
   - 只收集必要资料  
   - 资料安全保护，防止未经授权访问  
   - 未经同意不会披露给第三方，除非法律要求或合作提供服务

5. 资料保留期限  
   - 仅在达成目的期间保留，之后删除或匿名化处理

6. 用户权利  
   - 查阅、更正、删除个人资料  
   - 随时取消直销推广资料接收

7. 身份验证  
   - 核实用户身份后处理相关请求

8. 投诉渠道  
   - 用户可向澳门个人资料保护办公室投诉

9. 联系方式  
   - 联系电邮：customer.centre@cem-macau.com  
   - 通讯地址：澳门马交石炮台马路澳电大楼

10. 声明更新  
    - 隐私声明可能不时更新，最新版本公布于官网

",
    "metadata": {
        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/privacy-statement/",
        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/privacy-statement/"
    }
}

{
    "page_content": "90
25. Customer’s rights (25)
25.1 The Customer is granted the right to apply from the inspection 
entity:
a) An inspection of the electric installation if convinced not to 
be the perpetrator of any fraud;
b) An arbitration on the indemnity to be paid to the Customer 
for unreasonable termination or suspension of supply on 
the part of the Company;
c) An arbitration over the amount paid in consequence of the 
fraudulent behavior, when considered excessive.
25.2 When through the inspection referred to in subparagraph a) of the 
previous paragraph, it has been found that there is no fraud or the 
fraud is not imputable to the Customer, the Customer may demand 
from the Company the repair or replacement deemed necessary to 
restore the electric installation to its proper working condition and 
the immediate reconnection of electricity supply.
26. Jurisdiction  (26)
 The Court of Law in the Macau Special Administrative Region will 
entertain jurisdiction over any disputes that may arise between the 
Customer and the Company.",

    "page_content": "89Standard Conditions of Supply of Electricity Ė
23.3 When suspicion of fraudulent procedure arises, the Company shall 
request the presence of two witnesses, duly credentialed by competent 
authorities, to confirm or deny the existence of fraud.
23.4 When the existence of fraud is confirmed and imputable to the 
Customer, the Company reserves the right:
a) To be reimbursed for the amount corresponding to energy 
illicitly consumed and of any expenses related to the 
elimination of the fraud, namely the repair or replacement 
of damaged equipment;
b) To withhold supply until full payment is made of the amount 
due according to the previous subparagraph.
24. Value of energy illicitly consumed  (24)
24.1 The value of the energy illicitly consumed is computed by the 
Company, based on the highest tariff set for the subgroup contracted 
by the Customer, plus 25%, taking into account all the facts relevant 
to the computation of real consumption during the period wherein 
the fraudulent procedure took place, namely the characteristics of the 
installation, its schedule of operation, previous readings, if any, and 
posterior readings, if necessary.
24.2 When there are no elements to allow an objective computation of 
energy illicitly consumed, the relevant value is computed using the 
following rules:
a) Low-voltage Customers
Pc up to 20.7 kV A ................. 50-hour monthly usage of Pc
Pc from 34.5kV A to 69 kV ..... 70-hour monthly usage of Pc
Pc from 100 kV A to 340 kV A .100-hour monthly usage of Pc
Pc above 340 kV A ........... 200-hour monthly usage of Pc
b) Medium-voltage Customers .... 300-hour monthly usage of Pc
Whereof “Pc” is the demand subscribed by the Customer
24.3 Estimation performed in the terms of the previous paragraph 
comprises the period in relation thereto proof was presented wherein 
such irregular consumption was maintained or, if such evidence does 
not exist, a period of thirty-six months.",

{
    "page_content": "1. 适用范围：C组适用于使用中压电网，且订定功率 ≥ 1,000 kVA（或857 kW）的客户。

2. 使用条件：欲改为C组，须至少有一个高用电季节（6‑9月）月份以C组收费。

3. 收费分类：C1为一般收费，C2为低压计算用电客户。

4. 功率计算公式：
  • 功率费依 P = 0.2 × Pc + 0.8 × Pu 计算，其中：
    – Pc：订定功率（kW），若Pu > Pc则Pc更新为Pu，若Pu在12个月内低于Pc则Pc下降为Pu。
    – Pu：该月最大记录功率（kW）。
  • C2需额外缴付最大功率1%作变压器铜损补偿。

5. 有功电能（千瓦时）：
  • 按实际用电量收费。
  • C2另需支付有功电能1%附加费补偿变压器铜损。

6. 无功电能（千乏时）：
  • 满负荷与繁忙时段：若无功电量 > 同时段有功电能60%，超出部分需付费。
  • 非繁忙时段：送往电网之无功电全数计费。
  • C2再加收同时段有功电能10%作无功补偿，该附加费：
    – 满负荷／繁忙时间收取；
    – 非繁忙时间减收。

7. 季节定义：
  • 高用电季节为6月至9月；
  • 低用电季节为10月至翌年5月。

8. 计费时段分类：
  • 满负荷：10:30‑13:00、14:30‑16:00；
  • 繁忙：09:30‑10:30、13:00‑14:30、16:00‑20:30；
  • 非繁忙：00:00‑09:30、20:30‑24:00。

9. 价格一览（澳门元）：
  • 功率费：C1 = 19.797 元/kW；C2 = 21.484 元/kW
  • 有功电能（高季）：满负荷 1.432；繁忙 0.885；非繁忙 0.749
  • 有功电能（低季）：满负荷 0.776；繁忙 0.776；非繁忙 0.724
  • 无功电能（高季）：满负荷 0.348；繁忙 0.348；非繁忙 0.116
  • 无功电能（低季）：满负荷 0.348；繁忙 0.348；非繁忙 0.116

10. 其他附加条款：
   • 收费按照季度进行调整；
   • 额外另加政府税项。",
    "metadata": {
        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/billing-service/tariff-group-c/",
        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/billing-service/tariff-group-c/"
    }
}

augmented_query: Can I receive both electronic and paper bills simultaneously for my account? What are the options available for billing preferences with my account?

query: 使用電子賬單後，我可以怎樣繳交電費？
response:
### 如何使用电子账单支付电费

使用电子账单后，您可以通过多种方式缴交电费，包括：1. **电子支付**，通过网上银行或手机应用进行；2. **自动转账**，确保在到期日前自动扣款；3. **自助服务机**，使用电子支付方式进行支付；4. **现金或支票**，前往指定柜台支付。电子账单会免除邮递延误的风险，并提供便捷的随时查询功能。
answer: 電子賬單與紙質賬單的繳費方式相同，同樣能透過多種繳費方法繳交電費。您可透過電子支付隨時繳交電費，既方便又快捷，或於便利店、澳門自來水或澳電客戶服務中心櫃台出示賬單繳費二維碼繳交電費。如欲獲得更多繳費方面的資訊，可按這裏。

{
    "page_content": "
了解我的账单

1. 合约号：当查询供电事宜或账单时，请提供此号码。
2. 应付总金额：应缴费用的总数。
3. 到期付款日：客户须于此日期或之前缴付电费。若逾期缴费，将在下月账单内征收逾期附加费。
4. 自动转账资料（只适用于自动转账客户）：此栏印有自动转账的银行名称及过数日期。
5. 下月抄表日期：安排于此日期抄读用电度数。
6. 用电时期：上月抄表日期至本月抄表日期及之间的用电天数。
7. 用电量（度）：将本月读数与上月读数相减，再乘以乘数值。
8. 按金：按订定功率值（电表大小）计算，用以保证客户依时缴付所有电费。
9. 收费调整系数：按季度调整以反映电力生产和购买之成本上的浮动。
10. 政府税：就每月使用电力装置所需缴纳的税项。",
    "metadata": {
        "source": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/billing-service/understand-my-bill/",
        "loc": "https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/customer-service/billing-service/understand-my-bill/"
    }
}

{
    "page_content": "85Standard Conditions of Supply of Electricity Ė
19. Billing and collection  (19)
19.1 Electricity consumed is billed on a monthly basis, pursuant to a tariff 
system ﬁxed by the Macau Special Administrative Region.
19.2 The Company shall deliver the bill, whereof the consumption, the 
elements necessary to its veri ﬁcation and the amount due are contained, 
at the site of consumption or any other location indicated by the 
Customer, within a maximum period of three working days from the 
reading.
19.3 If by reasons imputable to the Customer, or by force majeure, the meter 
could not be read, the bill shall be issued for the corresponding period 
according to the average of consumption recorded during the previous 
twelve months or, if such is not feasible, the average of the consumption 
recorded to date, whereof corresponding demand is always due.
19.4 The consumption referred to under the previous paragraph shall be 
cleared against the billing of subsequent readings, whereof the bill is 
computed through relevant tariff.
19.5 The payment of the bill is due in a maximum of ﬁfteen days, counted 
from the reading date, at the ofﬁce of the Company or through institutions 
and methods indicated on the back of the bill.
19.6 In the same manner and within the same term, the Customer is obliged to 
pay the services rendered by the Company as well as any legal charges 
due.
19.7 The Customer shall by no means whatsoever retain or deduct any part 
of the amount due.
19.8 Failure to pay the bill on or before the payment due date, which shall be 
written on the bill, is levied with a surcharge over the amount due, ﬁxed 
by the Macau Special Administrative Region, whereof the Company 
may also suspend the energy supply after ﬁve working days from such 
date.",

}

    "page_content": "84
Sale of Electricity
17. Metering of energy and demand  (17)
17.1 In general, energy consumed and demand subscribed by the Customer 
are evaluated through direct measurement performed with metering 
equipment and respective fittings.
17.2 Metering equipment and respective fittings, of the type that has been 
officially approved and duly calibrated and sealed, required for billing, 
are supplied, installed and maintained solely by the Company.
17.3 The reading of the Customer’s meter is performed periodically, in 
preestablished days, the date thereof shall be written on the bill of the 
latest month.
17.4 If reading is not performed on a monthly basis or if reading has not 
been taken due to Customer’s absence or any other reason imputable 
thereto, the bill shall be issued pursuant to paragraph 19.3 hereof.
17.5 If due to systematic absence or other reason imputable to the 
Customer, the reading is not performed for four consecutive months, 
the Company reserves the right to suspend electricity supply to the 
Customer, notwithstanding any action deemed necessary for the 
settlement of any debts due.
18. Tariffs  (18)
 Electricity tariffs and tariff periods are fixed by the Macau Special 
Administrative Region.",

15.9 Notices of supply interruption shall contain a warning of live 
installations.
16. Suspension of supply  (16)
16.1 The Company may suspend the supply of electricity when any of the 
following events imputable to the Customer occur:
a) Noncompliance with provisions that aim to eliminate 
any type of disruption to network operation and other 
installations, as well as in concern to the safety of persons 
and property;
b) Impossibility to read meters as covered by clause 17 
hereof;
c) Opposition to inspection of installations within the 
appointed schedule;
d) Failure to pay bills for energy consumption and demand, as 
well as any additional charges and services, within the term 
provided;
e) Fraud, as provided under paragraph 23.4;
f) Failure to update the guarantee within the term provided 
after being served notice to that effect by the Company;
g) In the situation provided under paragraph 9.4;
h) Failure to regularize default situations provided under 
paragraph 1.4 or clause 22, hereof, within the term provided 
to that effect by the Company.
16.2 Interruption of supply in situation provided under the previous 
paragraph shall not exempt the Customer from possible civil or 
criminal liability.
16.3 In the case provided under subparagraph 16.1 d), the Company 
reserves the right to withhold reconnection from the Customer until 
all outstanding bills are paid and, if necessary, the guarantee referred 
to under clause 4, hereof duly replenished, wherefore reconnection is 
subject to the payment of a charge in the terms of the Law.",

{
    "page_content": "1. 联系电话：如需更新任何个人资料，用户需致电2833 9911与澳电客户联系中心客户服务主任联络。

2. 电动汽车充电站的使用条款说明：
   - 在澳门特区政府的同意下，澳电在澳门提供充电站供电动汽车使用。
   - 如发现充电站出现任何损坏或操作失灵，请即时停止使用该设施及充电服务。
   - 用户对正确使用电动汽车充电站负有责任，必须按照《如何充电》中的指引使用充电站。
   - 充电进行期间，切勿直接从车辆拔除充电连接器。如需终止充电，必须依照“停止充电”之程序。

3. 电动汽车充电费用支付服务：
   - 用户可通过电子钱包内余额或以信用卡或银联无感支付授权金额作一次性支付。

4. 电动汽车充电收费的具体规定：
   - 充电收费按照充电速度以每度电计算，具体收费如下：
     - 慢速：按时段收费，分为繁忙时间（09:00 至20:00）及非繁忙时间（20:00 至09:00）两种收费。
     - 中速：全日24小时划一收费。
     - 快速：全日24小时划一收费。

5. 入驻和注册有关的信息：未得澳电书面授权，任何人士均不可重新分配或复制本网站的一切资料。

{
    "page_content": "91Standard Conditions of Supply of Electricity Ė
Schedule 1 - Guarantee to be given by 
Customers
Guarantee to be given by Customers for electricity 
supply contracts
1. Type of guarantee
 (27)
1.1 The guarantee is given by the Customer in cash or any other means of 
payment on demand.
1.2 When the electricity supply contracts involve subscribed demand 
higher than 340 kV A, the Customer may grant suretyship by means 
of a bank guarantee or insurance-guarantee, compliant with sample 
included under Schedule 2 hereof, wherefore charges in result thereof 
shall also run on the account of the Customer.
2. Calculation of the amount of the guarantee (28)
2.1 The amount of the guarantee corresponds to the cost of the energy 
consumed within a certain amount of hours of subscribed demand 
(Pc) usage, as follows:
a) Pc up to 100 kV A .... 60 hours
b) Pc from 100 kV A to 1600 kV A .... 120 hours
c) Pc above 1600 kV A .... 160 hours
2.2 When computing the amount of the guarantee, the general tariff class 
A1 in force on the date of the guarantee shall be taken into account.
2.3 In case of short-term temporary contracts, the guarantee shall be 
double that computed in the terms of the previous paragraphs.
2.4 To the effect of the previous paragraph, any contract signed for or less 
than a 45-day term is considered a short-term temporary contract.",

entities.description: The Billing and Collection Process outlines the procedures for issuing bills and collecting payments for electricity services.
Online Services allow customers to manage their electricity accounts, track application progress, and make inquiries.
Billing Procedures outline the methods and timelines for charging Customers for their electricity consumption based on meter readings.
电子支付encompasses various electronic methods for paying bills, including online banking and mobile payments.
Payment Due Date is the deadline by which customers must pay their electricity bill to avoid late fees.
Outstanding Bills refer to unpaid charges for energy consumption and services that the Customer owes to The Company.
Electricity Bill refers to the statement detailing the amount owed for electricity usage, including various charges and due dates.
Customer Service encompasses various support options for customers to manage their electricity accounts and resolve issues.
账单通知是客户在启用电子账单服务后收到的确认信息。
Debits Due refer to amounts that the Customer owes to the Company as a result of corrections made to previous billing errors.
电子账单是指通过电子方式发送的账单，具有环保、便捷和可靠的特点。

信用卡is a payment method that users can use for one-time payments for electric vehicle charging services.<SEP>信用卡refers to a payment method that allows users to pay for charging services in a one-time transaction.

The电子钱包is a digital payment method that users can utilize to pay for charging services at the electric vehicle charging stations.<SEP>电子钱包refers to a digital wallet that users can use to maintain a balance for charging services.
支票is a traditional payment method where customers can send checks to pay their electricity bills.
手机短讯是接收电子账单的一种方式，申请后即时生效。
无感支付refers to a payment method that allows for automatic payment once pre-registered.

relationships.description: 澳电提供电子账单服务，允许客户选择以电子方式接收账单。
The Customer's Electricity Consumption is monitored and billed by the Company based on usage over time.
政府税是Electricity Bill中包含的费用，客户需按月支付。
The Company bills customers based on their electricity consumption, which is measured monthly.
The Company operates within the Electricity Billing System to manage billing and collection of electricity consumption from customers.

relationships.description: 电费缴交outlines the various payment methods offered by澳门电力股份有限公司for electricity bills.
自助服务机provides an electronic option for customers to pay their electricity bills as part of电费缴交.
电子支付is another method available under电费缴交for customers to pay their bills electronically.
自动转账is one of the methods included in电费缴交for paying electricity bills.
支票is a method of payment that falls under the category of电费缴交for settling electricity bills.
Online Services are part of澳电's offerings, allowing customers to manage their accounts and track applications online.
The Customer benefits from Billing Corrections, which ensure they are charged accurately for their energy consumption.
Outstanding Bills must be paid by the Customer to avoid suspension of electricity supply by The Company.
Debits Due represent the amounts the Customer must pay to the Company following corrections to their billing.
The Company implements Billing Procedures to charge the Customer based on Meter Readings.
CEM Macau issues the Electricity Bill to customers detailing their electricity usage and charges.
The Company implements Billing Corrections to address any discrepancies found in customer bills due to metering errors.
The Company implements the Billing and Collection Process to manage how bills are issued and payments are collected.
收费调整系数在Electricity Bill中反映电力成本的变化。
中国银行offers services that allow customers to pay their electricity bills as part of电费缴交.
极易付offers convenient options for paying electricity bills included in电费缴交.
Cash Payment is one of the methods by which the Customer can fulfill the Guarantee requirement for electricity supply contracts.

query: 如何確認電子賬單為澳電所發出？
response:
### 如何确认电子账单的来源

当您启用电子账单服务后，澳电会按您选取的方式发出新账单，并通过以下方式通知您：电子邮件（cem_bill@cem-macau.com）、手机短讯（853660128339933）、或推送通知（澳电微信 / 澳电APP）。确保您接收到的账单信息与上述渠道发出的通知一致，从而确认其为澳电所发出。
answer: 當您啟用電子賬單服務後，我們會按您選取的方式發出新賬單。您將會收到以下由澳電發出的賬單通知：電郵：cem_bill@cem-macau.com 手機短訊：853660128339933 推送通知：澳電微信/ 澳電APP
